summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 30072, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of North 71st Street from Dayton Avenue to Fremont Avenue; of Dayton Avenue from North 70th Street to North 72nd Street, all in the City of Seattle as public streets and highways; providing for the taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law" approved September 27, 1912.
